name: EX MACHINA
description:
November 2021

Ex Machina was done for the game jam Video Games Lab 2021.

  • Genre: Arcade, Casual, Speed Run
  • Engine: Unity
  • Team size: 6
  • Duration: 2 days
CONTROLS

Xbox game pad (recommanded) :

  • Jump : A
  • Dash : X or RT
  • Move : Left Joystick

Keyboard (not recommanded) :

  • Jump: Space
  • Dash : E or Right Click
  • Move : Q & D
